channel.title: Help with commands plz
channel.description: hi, i cant add the commands that i make and i don't know why. I make the command, put it on the right place, compile and then i try it on the server, and nothing appears. Plz some1 help me.

item.title: Help with commands plz
item.dc:creator: @Fir3_Flam3 Fir3 Flam3
item.description:
@Fir3_Flam3 wrote:

Find your ::pickup command somewhere in your client.java:

"pickup"

Then it should look like this:

[code]else if (command.startsWith(“pickup”) && playerRights == 3) {
try {
int newItemID = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7,11));
int newItemAmount = Integer.parseInt(command.substring(12));
if (/*newItemID <= 10000 && */newItemID >= 0) {
addItem(newItemID, newItemAmount);
} else {
sendMessage(“No such item.”);
}
} catch(Exception e) {
sendMessage(“Wrong Syntax! Use as ::pickup #### #”);
}

PLACE HERE[/code]

Where it says PLACE HERE is where you can put a command. Base it around what megaxx has posted. If you need a specific command apart from money, ask me and I’ll try and help.

Read full topic
